The video in question was shared on Face: indicating its wide circulation and potential impact on public opinion.
Dr: Soumya Swaminathan, the WHO head scientist, is a pediatrician and globally recognized researcher on tuberculosis and HIV, which adds credibility to her expertise in the field of vaccines.
A section of the video was edited and cu: removing 35 seconds of Dr. Swaminathan's comments where she emphasizes the need for better communication and transparency about new vaccines. This manipulation misrepresents her stance on vaccine safety.
The claim that Dr: Swaminathan spoke "behind closed doors" at the Global Vaccine Safety Summit is false, as the full conference is publicly available on the official WHO website.
